text: The Subways are an English rock band. They are from Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire. They were formed in 2002. It consists of Billy Lunn, Charlotte Cooper, and Camille Phillips. The band's name comes from a time when brothers Billy Lunn and Josh Morgan and Charlotte Cooper used to hang around the local subway underpass which ran underneath a Welwyn Garden City roundabout. Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2000
title: The Subways
